sn47:1.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati ambapālivane.

sn47:1.3.2_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
sn47:2.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati ambapālivane.

sn47:2.2.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn47:2.3.2_6: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
sn47:2.3.2_8: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
sn47:2.3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajānakārī hoti.
sn47:3.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn47:3.1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:3.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:3.1.3_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn47:3.1.4_1: dhamme ca bhāsite mameva anubandhitabbaṁ maññantī”ti.
sn47:3.1.5_3: Appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṁ jāneyyaṁ,
sn47:3.1.5_4: appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
sn47:3.1.6_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ, bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
sn47:3.1.9_1: sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ bhavissati diṭṭhi ca ujukā,
sn47:3.1.9_3: sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne tividhena bhāveyyāsi.
sn47:3.2.2_1: ajjhattaṁ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:3.2.3_0: bahiddhā vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
sn47:3.2.4_0: ajjhattabahiddhā vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:3.2.7_0: ajjhattabahiddhā vā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:3.2.10_0: ajjhattabahiddhā vā citte cittānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:3.2.13_0: ajjhattabahiddhā vā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:3.2.14_1: sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṁ tividhena bhāvessasi,
sn47:3.2.14_3: yā ratti vā divaso vā āgamissati vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu,
sn47:3.3.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn47:3.3.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn47:3.3.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn47:3.3.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn47:3.3.4_0: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn47:4.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sālāya brāhmaṇagāme.
sn47:4.1.2_0: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi …pe… etadavoca:
sn47:4.2.1_2: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, te vo,
sn47:4.2.1_4: bhikkhū catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
sn47:4.2.3_1: kāye kāyānupassino viharatha ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,
sn47:4.2.4_0: vedanāsu vedanānupassino viharatha ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,
sn47:4.2.5_0: citte cittānupassino viharatha ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,
sn47:4.2.6_0: dhammesu dhammānupassino viharatha ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,
sn47:4.3.1_2: bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānā viharanti,
sn47:4.3.1_3: tepi kāye kāyānupassino viharanti ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,

sn47:4.4.1_2: bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā,
sn47:4.4.1_3: tepi kāye kāyānupassino viharanti ātāpino sampajānā ekodibhūtā vippasannacittā samāhitā ekaggacittā,

sn47:5.1.3_0: “‘akusalarāsī’ti, bhikkhave, vadamāno pañca nīvaraṇe sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn47:5.1.4_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, akusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—pañca nīvaraṇā.
sn47:5.1.7_0: ‘Akusalarāsī’ti, bhikkhave, vadamāno ime pañca nīvaraṇe sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn47:5.1.8_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, akusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—pañca nīvaraṇā.
sn47:5.2.1_0: ‘Kusalarāsī’ti, bhikkhave, vadamāno cattāro satipaṭṭhāne sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn47:5.2.2_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
sn47:5.2.4_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:5.2.7_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:5.2.8_0: ‘Kusalarāsī’ti, bhikkhave, vadamāno ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn47:5.2.9_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
sn47:6.1.1_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi.
sn47:6.1.2_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṁ paridevasi:
sn47:6.1.3_0: ‘mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṁ appapuññā, ye mayaṁ agocare carimha paravisaye.
sn47:6.1.4_0: Sacejja mayaṁ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
sn47:6.1.5_0: ‘Ko pana te, lāpa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo’ti?
sn47:6.1.7_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṁvadamānā lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ pamuñci:
sn47:6.1.8_0: ‘gaccha kho tvaṁ, lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī’ti.
sn47:6.2.1_2: lāpo sakuṇo naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṁ leḍḍuṭṭhānaṁ gantvā mahantaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvā sakuṇagghiṁ vadamāno aṭṭhāsi:
sn47:6.2.2_0: ‘ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghī’ti.
sn47:6.2.3_2: sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṁvadamānā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā.
sn47:6.2.4_2: aññāsi lāpo sakuṇo ‘bahuāgato kho myāyaṁ sakuṇagghī’ti,
sn47:6.2.5_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi tattheva uraṁ paccatāḷesi.
sn47:6.2.6_0: Evañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47:6.3.1_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47:6.3.2_0: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṁ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47:6.3.3_0: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47:6.3.6_0: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
sn47:6.3.10_0: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
sn47:6.4.1_0: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47:6.4.2_0: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47:6.4.3_0: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47:6.4.7_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:6.4.10_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
sn47:6.4.11_0: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
sn47:7.1.1_3: yattha neva makkaṭānaṁ cārī na manussānaṁ.
sn47:7.1.4_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, luddā makkaṭavīthīsu lepaṁ oḍḍenti makkaṭānaṁ bādhanāya.
sn47:7.2.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te makkaṭā abālajātikā alolajātikā, te taṁ lepaṁ disvā ārakā parivajjanti.
sn47:7.2.2_0: Yo pana so hoti makkaṭo bālajātiko lolajātiko, so taṁ lepaṁ upasaṅkamitvā hatthena gaṇhāti.
sn47:7.2.8_0: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pādañcā’ti dutiyena pādena gaṇhāti.
sn47:7.2.10_0: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pāde cā’ti tuṇḍena gaṇhāti.
sn47:7.2.12_2: makkaṭo pañcoḍḍito thunaṁ seti anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo luddassa.
sn47:7.2.13_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, luddo vijjhitvā tasmiṁyeva kaṭṭhakataṅgāre avassajjetvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
sn47:7.2.14_0: Evaṁ so taṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47:7.3.1_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47:7.3.2_0: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṁ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47:7.3.3_0: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47:7.3.7_0: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
sn47:7.3.11_0: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā.
sn47:7.4.1_0: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47:7.4.2_0: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47:7.4.3_0: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47:7.4.7_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:7.4.10_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:7.4.11_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
sn47:8.1.1_2: bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattaṁ vā nānaccayehi sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa—
sn47:8.2.1_0: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṁ na uggaṇhāti:
sn47:8.2.2_0: ‘idaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.2.3_0: Ambilaggaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.2.3_10: aloṇikaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.3.1_2: bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo na ceva lābhī hoti acchādanassa,
sn47:8.3.3_0: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṁ na uggaṇhāti.
sn47:8.3.4_2: idhekacco bālo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:8.3.5_0: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṁ na samādhiyati, upakkilesā na pahīyanti.
sn47:8.3.9_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:8.3.10_0: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṁ na samādhiyati, upakkilesā na pahīyanti.
sn47:8.4.1_2: bālo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu na ceva lābhī hoti diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihārānaṁ,
sn47:8.4.3_0: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, bālo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṁ na uggaṇhāti.
sn47:8.5.1_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattaṁ vā nānaccayehi sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa—
sn47:8.6.1_0: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṁ uggaṇhāti:
sn47:8.6.2_0: ‘idaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.6.3_0: Ambilaggaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.6.3_10: aloṇikaṁ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṁ ruccati,
sn47:8.7.1_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo lābhī ceva hoti acchādanassa,
sn47:8.7.3_0: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṁ uggaṇhāti.
sn47:8.7.4_2: idhekacco paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:8.7.5_0: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṁ samādhiyati, upakkilesā pahīyanti.
sn47:8.7.9_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:8.7.10_0: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṁ samādhiyati, upakkilesā pahīyanti.
sn47:8.8.1_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu lābhī ceva hoti diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihārānaṁ,
sn47:8.8.3_0: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṁ uggaṇhātī”ti.
sn47:9.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati veḷuvagāmake.
sn47:9.1.4_0: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samantā vesāliyā yathāmittaṁ yathāsandiṭṭhaṁ yathāsambhattaṁ vassaṁ upetha.
sn47:9.1.6_1: bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā samantā vesāliyā yathāmittaṁ yathāsandiṭṭhaṁ yathāsambhattaṁ vassaṁ upagacchuṁ.
sn47:9.1.7_0: Bhagavā pana tattheva veḷuvagāmake vassaṁ upagacchi.
sn47:9.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavato vassūpagatassa kharo ābādho uppajji, bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā.
sn47:9.2.2_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sato sampajāno adhivāsesi avihaññamāno.
sn47:9.2.4_0: “na kho me taṁ patirūpaṁ, yohaṁ anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parinibbāyeyyaṁ.
sn47:9.2.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ imaṁ ābādhaṁ vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāraṁ adhiṭṭhāya vihareyyan”ti.
sn47:9.2.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ ābādhaṁ vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāraṁ adhiṭṭhāya vihāsi.
sn47:9.2.7_0: Atha kho bhagavato so ābādho paṭippassambhi.
sn47:9.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā vihārā nikkhamitvā vihārapacchāyāyaṁ paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn47:9.3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:9.3.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:9.3.7_0: Api ca me, bhante, ahosi kācideva assāsamattā:
sn47:9.3.8_0: ‘na tāva bhagavā parinibbāyissati, na yāva bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ārabbha kiñcideva udāharatī’”ti.
sn47:9.4.1_0: “Kiṁ pana dāni, ānanda, bhikkhusaṅgho mayi paccāsīsati?
sn47:9.4.2_0: Desito, ānanda, mayā dhammo anantaraṁ abāhiraṁ karitvā.
sn47:9.4.6_0: Tathāgatassa kho, ānanda, na evaṁ hoti:
sn47:9.4.8_0: Sa kiṁ, ānanda, tathāgato bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ārabbha kiñcideva udāharissati.
sn47:9.4.9_0: Etarahi kho panāhaṁ, ānanda, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto.
sn47:9.4.12_0: evameva kho, ānanda, veḷamissakena maññe tathāgatassa kāyo yāpeti.
sn47:9.5.1_1: samaye tathāgato sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā ekaccānaṁ vedanānaṁ nirodhā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati,
sn47:9.5.2_0: Tasmātihānanda, attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā, dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.

sn47:10.1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena aññataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:10.1.2_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhuniyo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn47:10.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn47:10.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn47:10.2.1_2: sambahulā bhikkhuniyo catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā viharantiyo uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ sañjānantī”ti.
sn47:10.2.3_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati,
sn47:10.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
sn47:10.3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:10.3.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:10.4.1_1: pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena aññataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasaṅkamiṁ;
sn47:10.4.3_2: sambahulā bhikkhuniyo catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā viharantiyo uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ sañjānantī’ti.
sn47:10.4.4_0: Evaṁ vuttāhaṁ, bhante, tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocaṁ:
sn47:10.4.6_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati,
sn47:10.5.2_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati,
sn47:10.6.2_1: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:10.6.3_0: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato kāyārammaṇo vā uppajjati kāyasmiṁ pariḷāho,
sn47:10.6.4_0: Tenānanda, bhikkhunā kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahitabbaṁ.
sn47:10.6.5_0: Tassa kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahato pāmojjaṁ jāyati.
sn47:10.6.11_0: ‘yassa khvāhaṁ atthāya cittaṁ paṇidahiṁ, so me attho abhinipphanno.
sn47:10.6.13_0: So paṭisaṁharati ceva na ca vitakketi na ca vicāreti.
sn47:10.7.3_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:10.7.4_0: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato dhammārammaṇo vā uppajjati kāyasmiṁ pariḷāho,
sn47:10.7.5_0: Tenānanda, bhikkhunā kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahitabbaṁ.
sn47:10.7.6_0: Tassa kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahato pāmojjaṁ jāyati.
sn47:10.7.12_0: ‘yassa khvāhaṁ atthāya cittaṁ paṇidahiṁ, so me attho abhinipphanno.

sn47:10.7.16_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, paṇidhāya bhāvanā hoti.
sn47:10.8.2_0: Bahiddhā, ānanda, bhikkhu cittaṁ appaṇidhāya ‘appaṇihitaṁ me bahiddhā cittan’ti pajānāti.

sn47:10.8.5_0: Bahiddhā, ānanda, bhikkhu cittaṁ appaṇidhāya ‘appaṇihitaṁ me bahiddhā cittan’ti pajānāti.
sn47:10.8.7_0: Atha ca pana ‘vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā sukhamasmī’ti pajānāti.
sn47:10.8.8_0: Bahiddhā, ānanda, bhikkhu cittaṁ appaṇidhāya ‘appaṇihitaṁ me bahiddhā cittan’ti pajānāti.
sn47:10.8.10_0: Atha ca pana ‘citte cittānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā sukhamasmī’ti pajānāti.

sn47:11.1.4_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, mahāpuriso hotī”ti?
sn47:11.2.2_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:11.2.3_0: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṁ virajjati, vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn47:11.2.6_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.

sn47:12.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nālandāyaṁ viharati pāvārikambavane.
sn47:12.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:12.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:12.1.4_2: na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro,
sn47:12.1.5_0: “Uḷārā kho tyāyaṁ, sāriputta, āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ekaṁso gahito, sīhanādo nadito:
sn47:12.1.7_1: na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro,
sn47:12.2.1_2: ye te ahesuṁ atītamaddhānaṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā,
sn47:12.2.1_3: sabbe te bhagavanto cetasā ceto paricca viditā:
sn47:12.3.1_2: ye te bhavissanti anāgatamaddhānaṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā,
sn47:12.3.1_3: sabbe te bhagavanto cetasā ceto paricca viditā:
sn47:12.4.1_0: “Kiṁ pana tyāhaṁ, sāriputta, etarahi, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
sn47:12.5.2_0: Atha kiñcarahi tyāyaṁ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ekaṁso gahito, sīhanādo nadito:
sn47:12.5.4_2: na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā’ bhiyyobhiññataro,
sn47:12.6.1_0: “Na kho me, bhante, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu cetopariyañāṇaṁ atthi,
sn47:12.6.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, rañño paccantimaṁ nagaraṁ daḷhuddhāpaṁ daḷhapākāratoraṇaṁ ekadvāraṁ.
sn47:12.6.4_0: Tatrassa dovāriko paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṁ nivāretā ñātānaṁ pavesetā.
sn47:12.6.5_0: So tassa nagarassa samantā anupariyāyapathaṁ anukkamamāno na passeyya pākārasandhiṁ vā pākāravivaraṁ vā,
sn47:12.6.7_0: ‘ye kho keci oḷārikā pāṇā imaṁ nagaraṁ pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā,
sn47:12.6.7_1: sabbe te imināva dvārena pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā’ti.
sn47:12.6.8_0: Evameva kho me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito:
sn47:12.6.9_2: sabbe te bhagavanto pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya,
sn47:12.6.10_2: sabbe te bhagavanto pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya,
sn47:12.6.11_1: etarahi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya,
sn47:12.7.2_2: imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ bhāseyyāsi bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ.
sn47:12.7.3_2: moghapurisānaṁ bhavissati tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā,
sn47:12.7.3_3: tesampimaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ sutvā yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā sā pahīyissatī”ti.
sn47:13.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn47:13.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn47:13.1.3_0: Cundo ca samaṇuddeso āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
sn47:13.2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto teneva ābādhena parinibbāyi.
sn47:13.2.2_0: Atha kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato sāriputtassa pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn47:13.2.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn47:13.2.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:13.3.1_0: “Atthi kho idaṁ, āvuso cunda, kathāpābhataṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
sn47:13.3.2_0: Āyāmāvuso cunda, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocessāmā”ti.
sn47:13.3.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
sn47:13.4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca ānando cundo ca samaṇuddeso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn47:13.4.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:13.4.5_3: dhammāpi maṁ nappaṭibhanti ‘āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti sutvā”.
sn47:13.5.2_1: āyasmā sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṁ vā ādāya parinibbuto,
sn47:13.5.6_1: āyasmā sāriputto ovādako ahosi otiṇṇo viññāpako sandassako samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako,
sn47:13.5.7_0: Taṁ mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammojaṁ dhammabhogaṁ dhammānuggahaṁ anussarāmā”ti.
sn47:13.6.3_0: Taṁ kutettha, ānanda, labbhā. Yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ, taṁ vata mā palujjīti—
sn47:13.6.5_0: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato yo mahantataro khandho so palujjeyya;
sn47:13.6.6_0: evameva kho ānanda, mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāriputto parinibbuto.
sn47:13.6.7_0: Taṁ kutettha, ānanda, labbhā. Yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ, taṁ vata mā palujjī’ti—

sn47:14.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati ukkacelāyaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aciraparinibbutesu sāriputtamoggallānesu.
sn47:14.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ajjhokāse nisinno hoti.
sn47:14.2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn47:14.2.2_0: “api myāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā suññā viya khāyati parinibbutesu sāriputtamoggallānesu.
sn47:14.2.6_3: tesampi bhagavantānaṁ etapparamaṁyeva sāvakayugaṁ bhavissati—seyyathāpi mayhaṁ sāriputtamoggallānā.
sn47:14.2.7_0: Acchariyaṁ, bhikkhave, sāvakānaṁ, abbhutaṁ, bhikkhave, sāvakānaṁ.
sn47:14.2.8_0: Satthu ca nāma sāsanakarā bhavissanti ovādappaṭikarā,
sn47:14.2.8_1: catunnañca parisānaṁ piyā bhavissanti manāpā garubhāvanīyā ca.
sn47:14.2.9_0: Acchariyaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa, abbhutaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa.
sn47:14.2.10_0: Evarūpepi nāma sāvakayuge parinibbute natthi tathāgatassa soko vā paridevo vā.
sn47:14.2.11_2: Yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ,
sn47:14.2.13_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato ye mahantatarā khandhā te palujjeyyuṁ;
sn47:14.2.14_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāriputtamoggallānā parinibbutā.

sn47:15.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā bāhiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:15.1.3_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.

sn47:15.1.7_4: sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyyāsi.

sn47:15.2.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.

sn47:15.3.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn47:15.3.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn47:15.3.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bāhiyo arahataṁ ahosīti.

sn47:18.3.1_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,

sn47:19.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sumbhesu viharati sedakaṁ nāma sumbhānaṁ nigamo.
sn47:19.1.3_0: “bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, caṇḍālavaṁsiko caṇḍālavaṁsaṁ ussāpetvā medakathālikaṁ antevāsiṁ āmantesi:
sn47:19.1.4_0: ‘ehi tvaṁ, samma medakathālike, caṇḍālavaṁsaṁ abhiruhitvā mama uparikhandhe tiṭṭhāhī’ti.
sn47:19.1.5_3: medakathālikā antevāsī caṇḍālavaṁsikassa paṭissutvā caṇḍālavaṁsaṁ abhiruhitvā ācariyassa uparikhandhe aṭṭhāsi.
sn47:19.1.6_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, caṇḍālavaṁsiko medakathālikaṁ antevāsiṁ etadavoca:
sn47:19.1.7_0: ‘tvaṁ, samma medakathālike, mamaṁ rakkha, ahaṁ taṁ rakkhissāmi.
sn47:19.1.8_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ aññamaññaṁ guttā aññamaññaṁ rakkhitā sippāni ceva dassessāma,
sn47:19.1.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, medakathālikā antevāsī caṇḍālavaṁsikaṁ etadavoca:
sn47:19.1.11_0: Tvaṁ, ācariya, attānaṁ rakkha, ahaṁ attānaṁ rakkhissāmi.
sn47:19.1.12_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ attaguttā attarakkhitā sippāni ceva dassessāma,
sn47:19.2.1_0: “So tattha ñāyo”ti bhagavā etadavoca, “yathā medakathālikā antevāsī ācariyaṁ avoca.
sn47:19.2.4_0: Attānaṁ, bhikkhave, rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati, paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ rakkhati.

sn47:28.1.3_0: “katamesaṁ, āvuso anuruddha, dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti?

sn47:28.2.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.

sn47:28.2.7_1: catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sahassaṁ lokaṁ abhijānāmī”ti.
sn47:29.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.

sn47:29.1.8_1: āyasmā ānando yena sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.

sn47:29.1.12_1: āyasmā ānando yena sirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.

sn47:29.2.1_2: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca:
sn47:29.3.2_0: ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;

sn47:43.3.1_2: brahmā sahampati mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,

sn47:45.1.1_0: “‘Kusalarāsī’ti, bhikkhave, vadamāno cattāro satipaṭṭhāne sammā vadamāno vadeyya.

sn47:46.1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn47:46.1.1_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

sn47:46.2.2_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ, bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.

sn47:46.2.5_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharissasi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesu;
sn47:46.2.5_3: sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyyāsi.
sn47:46.3.2_1: kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn47:46.3.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47:46.3.6_1: sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṁ bhāvessasi,
sn47:46.3.6_3: yā ratti vā divaso vā āgamissati vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu,
sn47:46.3.7_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn47:46.4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn47:46.4.1_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn47:46.4.2_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn47:46.4.3_0: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
